item.title: 高盛认为到 2027 年中国股市将有 30% 的上涨空间
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）预计，在亲市场政策、利润增长和强劲资金流的支持下，到 2027 年底，中国的主要股票指数将上涨 30%。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expects China’s key stock gauges to gain 30% by end-2027, supported by pro-market policies, rising profits and strong money flows.】

item.title: 中国每天向美国出口 10 亿美元显示了习近平的议价能力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战已经打了六个月，中国出口产品的韧性证明，即使在美国征收 55% 的关税后，中国的许多产品仍然是不可或缺的。【原文：Six months into Donald Trump’s trade war, the resilience of Chinese exports is proving just how essential many of its products remain even after US levies of 55%.】

item.title: 三星 Galaxy XR 耳机亮相，价格仅为苹果 Vision Pro 的一半
item.description:
这款售价 1800 美元的耳机是 "很快 "推出智能眼镜的先驱。【原文：

The $1,800 headset is a precursor to smart glasses launching “pretty soon.”

】

item.title: 造币厂》称美国可能在贸易协议中将印度关税税率降至 15-16
item.description: 印度造币厂报》援引三位不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道称，印度和美国即将达成一项贸易协议，将印度出口商品的关税从约 50%降至 15%-16%。【原文：India and the US are nearing a trade deal that could lower tariffs on Indian exports to 15%–16% from about 50%, the Mint newspaper reported, citing three unidentified people aware of the matter.】

item.title: 与武田达成 11.4 美元癌症药物交易后，Innovent 股价大涨
item.description: 中国制药商英诺生物公司宣布与日本制药商武田药品株式会社共同开发抗癌药物并在全球（包括美国）销售的协议后，周三在香港大涨。【原文：Chinese drugmaker Innovent Biologics Inc. rallied in Hong Kong Wednesday after announcing a deal to co-develop its cancer drugs with Japanese drugmaker Takeda Pharmaceutical Co. and sell them globally, including in the US.】

item.title: LG 化学股价大涨，原因是 Palliser 披露了所持股份，并敦促其做出改变
item.description: 在英国激进基金 Palliser Capital UK 披露持有这家韩国公司的股份并敦促进行包括董事会调整在内的变革之后，LG 化学有限公司的股价飙升至一年多来的最高点。【原文：LG Chem Ltd. shares surged to the highest in more than a year after UK-based activist fund Palliser Capital UK disclosed a stake in the South Korean firm and urged changes including a board shakeup.】

item.title: 日本首相高市下令采取一揽子经济措施应对通货膨胀
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈下令采取一揽子新的经济措施，旨在减轻通货膨胀给家庭和企业带来的负担。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi has ordered a fresh package of economic measures aimed at easing the burden of inflation on households and companies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚锂生产商 PLS 表示全球前景乐观
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的纯锂生产商 PLS 有限公司对电池金属的需求前景持乐观态度，因为该行业正在努力克服供应过剩导致价格下跌的问题。【原文：PLS Ltd., Australia’s largest pure-play lithium producer, is upbeat on the demand outlook for the battery metal as the sector works through a glut in supply that had led to a drop in prices.】

item.title: 暴雨毁坏农作物，中国全力确保玉米丰收
item.description: 中国北方的特大暴雨扰乱了收成，导致农作物烂在田里，在贸易关系破裂、进口萎缩之际，给粮食供应带来了压力。【原文：Epic rains in northern China have disrupted the harvest and left crops rotting in the fields, pressuring grain supplies at a time when trade relations are fraying and imports have shrunk.】

item.title: 日本出口自四月以来首次增长，芯片出口增长
item.description: 随着芯片和电子零件出货量的增长，日本的出口在五个月中首次出现增长，而在唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税的影响下，输往美国的商品继续下降。【原文：Japan’s exports rose for the first time in five months as shipments of chips and electronic parts advanced, while goods going to the US continued to decline amid President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 报告显示美国原油库存下降，原油涨势扩大
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国原油库存四周来首次减少，同时唐纳德-特朗普总统重申印度将减少购买俄罗斯能源之后，石油上涨。【原文：Oil gained after an industry report signaled US crude stockpiles shrunk for the first time in four weeks, while President Donald Trump reiterated India would trim its purchases of Russian energy.】

item.title: 苹果 M5 Vision Pro 在中国的最新转变--越南制造
item.description: 苹果公司的新款 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机并没有提供太多新功能，但该公司对其生产做出了显著改变。【原文：Apple Inc.’s new Vision Pro headset doesn’t offer much in the way of fresh features, but the company made a notable change to its production.】

item.title: 葡萄牙媒体大亨、前总理巴尔塞毛逝世，享年 88 岁
item.description: 葡萄牙最具影响力的政治人物之一、国内媒体帝国的缔造者弗朗西斯科-平托-巴尔塞芒（Francisco Pinto Balsemão）去世。享年 88 岁。【原文：Francisco Pinto Balsemão, one of Portugal’s most influential political figures and builder of a domestic media empire, has died. He was 88.】

item.title: 调查显示，英国房地产债务基金违约率飙升至 20% 以上
item.description: 贝耶斯商学院对债权人进行的一项调查显示，今年上半年，英国商业房地产行业的另类贷款人的违约率攀升至 20% 以上，显示出其投资组合的风险升高。【原文：Alternative lenders to the UK commercial real estate sector saw their default rates climb past 20% in the first half of the year, revealing elevated risks in their portfolios, according to a survey of creditors by Bayes Business School.】

item.title: Goodbody 称美国关税和税收风险对爱尔兰有所缓解
item.description: 据 Goodbody 证券经纪公司称，自 2025 年初以来，包括关税在内的美国政策变化给爱尔兰经济带来的风险已经降低。【原文：Risks to the Irish economy from US policy changes including tariffs have lowered since the beginning of 2025, according to Goodbody stockbrokers.】

item.title: 贝森特计划为阿根廷融资的时间紧迫
item.description: 距离阿根廷关键的中期选举只有几天时间了，人们越来越怀疑斯科特-贝森特能否完成其 400 亿美元救援计划的下半部分。【原文：With just a few days before a crucial midterm election in Argentina, skepticism is growing that Scott Bessent can pull off the second half of his $40 billion rescue package.】

item.title: KKR 称美元贬值导致更多投资从美国流向亚洲
item.description: KKR & Co.联席首席执行官表示，随着美元贬值和亚洲基本面的改善，大量投资美国的全球投资者正稳步将更多资金转向亚洲。【原文：Global investors with heavy US exposure are steadily shifting more capital to Asia as the dollar loses steam and the region’s fundamentals shine, according to the co-chief executive officer of KKR & Co.】

item.title: 印尼银行将连续第四次降息以促进经济增长
item.description: 印度尼西亚中央银行准备连续第四个月降低借贷成本，作为其 "全力以赴 "促进经济增长承诺的一部分。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank is poised to lower borrowing costs for a fourth straight month as part of its pledge to go “all out” in buoying economic growth.】

item.title: 金银大幅下跌后趋于稳定，反弹势头有所降温
item.description: 黄金和白银在经历了多年来最大幅度的抛售后企稳，因为投资者担心近期贵金属的历史性反弹使其估值过高，从而锁定了利润。【原文：Gold and silver steadied after their steepest selloff in years, as investors locked in profits on concern that the recent historic rally in the precious metals left them overvalued.】

item.title: 金银守住跌势，股市稍作喘息：市场综述
item.description: 在周二贵金属从前所未有的高位回落之后，黄金在亚洲早盘交易中持稳，白银走低。【原文：Gold was steady and silver edged lower in early Asia trading after the precious metals tumbled from unprecedented highs on Tuesday, while a rally in US stocks wavered amid signs of buyer exhaustion.】

item.title: DraftKings 收购受美国商品期货交易委员会监管的交易所，进行预测市场赌注
item.description: DraftKings Inc. 收购了一家受联邦监管的交易场所，这标志着该公司向有争议的预测市场迈出了最积极的一步。【原文：DraftKings Inc. has acquired a federally regulated trading venue, marking its most aggressive move yet into the contested world of prediction markets.】

item.title: 稀土如何成为中国强有力的贸易杠杆
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take Asia "播客中，我们将介绍中国如何占领稀土市场，以及在与美国的贸易战中如何利用这一优势。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, how China cornered the market for rare earths and how it’s leveraging that dominance in a trade war with the US.

】

item.title: Anthropic 与谷歌就数十亿美元云计算交易进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Anthropic PBC公司正在与Alphabet公司旗下的谷歌公司讨论一项交易，该交易将为这家人工智能公司提供额外的计算能力，价值高达数百亿美元。【原文：Anthropic PBC is in discussions with Alphabet Inc.’s Google about a deal that would provide the artificial intelligence company with additional computing power valued in the high tens of billions of dollars, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微软首席执行官在 "非凡 "之年获得 9,600 万美元薪酬组合
item.description: 微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）2025财年的薪酬待遇跃升至9650万美元，这是他十多年前担任首席执行官以来的最高薪酬，董事会称公司在人工智能方面取得了进展。【原文：Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella’s pay package jumped to $96.5 million for fiscal 2025, his highest compensation since he became CEO more than a decade ago, with the board citing the company’s progress in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 尽管遭遇欺诈诉讼，但西部联盟的业绩仍超出多数预期
item.description: 西部联盟银行公司（Western Alliance Bancorp）第三季度利润同比增长超过 27%，高于华尔街大多数人的预期，并向投资者保证，与一个商业房地产投资者集团有关的涉嫌欺诈案并未损害该银行的整体健康。该股在延时交易中上涨。【原文：Western Alliance Bancorp’s third-quarter profit rose more than 27% from a year earlier, topping most Wall Street projections and reassuring investors that an alleged fraud tied to a commercial real estate investor group didn’t impair the bank’s overall health. The stock rose in extended trading.】

item.title: 新进入者押宝小众汽车，抵御中国电动汽车的逆风
item.description: 尽管人们都在谈论中国汽车业充斥着难以实现盈利的低产量品牌，但事实证明，在全球最大的汽车市场上分一杯羹的潜力仍然是新进入者无法抗拒的。【原文：For all the talk of China’s car industry being crowded with low-volume brands that struggle to turn a profit, the potential to carve out a share of the world’s biggest auto market is still proving irresistible for new entrants.】

item.title: 套期保值成本上升，交易员为国债收益率下降做好准备
item.description: 尽管周二 30 年期国债收益率达到了六个月来的最低水平，但债券交易员仍在为国债收益率进一步下降做准备。【原文：Bond traders are preparing for Treasury yields to drop further even as the 30-year reached its lowest level in six months on Tuesday.】

item.title: Capital One 盈利超预期，宣布 160 亿美元回购
item.description: Capital One Financial Corp. 公布的第三季度利润大幅增长，超过了华尔街的预期，该贷款公司宣布计划在收购 Discover Financial Services 之后回购多达 160 亿美元的股票。【原文：Capital One Financial Corp. reported a surge in third-quarter profit, beating Wall Street estimates, and the lender announced plans to repurchase as much as $16 billion of stock in the wake of its acquisition of Discover Financial Services.】

item.title: GE Vernova 同意支付 53 亿美元收购 Prolec 50%的股份
item.description: 随着人工智能热潮对电力行业产品和服务需求的推动，通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.【原文：GE Vernova Inc. has agreed to buy the stake in transformer maker Prolec GE that it doesn’t already own as the artificial intelligence boom drives demand for products and services in the power sector.】

item.title: 穆迪称美国银行支持 3000 亿美元私人信贷债务
item.description: 对承销质量的担忧使私人信贷在华尔街炙手可热。然而，一些发出警告的银行却在推动该资产类别的增长。【原文：Anxiety about the quality of underwriting has put private credit in the hot seat on Wall Street. Yet some of the same banks raising the alarm are the ones fueling growth in the asset class.】
